tasks.label: flutter: install windows
tasks.command: flutter build windows --debug && cmake --build build/windows/x64 --target INSTALL --config Debug

tasks.label: flutter: build release
tasks.command: flutter build windows --release && cmake --build build/windows/x64 --target INSTALL --config Release

tasks.label: xcode: build iOS
tasks.command: xcodebuild -project ScheduleHQ.xcodeproj -scheme ScheduleHQ -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' build

tasks.label: xcode: clean build iOS
tasks.command: xcodebuild clean -project ScheduleHQ.xcodeproj -scheme ScheduleHQ && xcodebuild -project ScheduleHQ.xcodeproj -scheme ScheduleHQ -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' build

tasks.label: xcode: run iOS simulator
tasks.command: xcrun simctl terminate booted com.schedulehq.app 2>/dev/null; xcrun simctl install booted "$HOME/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/ScheduleHQ-alpwrfuqtzckfabxauvdppkylndw/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/ScheduleHQ.app" && xcrun simctl launch booted com.schedulehq.app
